nodes.text: Chasin was a planet of the Core Worlds.

Chasin was under Imperial control during the Zsinj campaign and the Thrawn campaign. It was defended by a Torpedo Sphere, which was destroyed in a collision with the Vengeance-class dreadnought Javelin during the Imperial Mutiny.
Its government was among the first to throw its support behind Corellia in 40 ABY during the Second Galactic Civil War.
